channel.title: Comments on: Open Science has an image and behaviour problem

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/open-science-image-problem/#comment-2711">Opencon Fan</a>.
Something to do with the numbers, I believe. Last year, it received more than 15,000 applications! There has to be a filter mechanism. The satellite events are a fantastic way to be involved if you can't make it to the big show.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Opencon Fan.

Something to do with the numbers, I believe. Last year, it received more than 15,000 applications! There has to be a filter mechanism. The satellite events are a fantastic way to be involved if you can’t make it to the big show.
